meanings.sent1: The staminate flowers were colorful and vibrant.
meanings.sent2: The plant only produced staminate flowers.
meanings.sent3: The garden was full of staminate blooms, making it a bee paradise.
meanings.sent4: His artwork was like a staminate garden, filled with bold strokes and no delicate details.
meanings.sent5: The staminate petals stood out against the green leaves, attracting all the pollinators.

meanings.sent1: She carefully examined the staminate in the bouquet.
meanings.sent2: The staminate emitted a pleasant fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The staminate seemed to be the star of the floral show.
meanings.sent4: The staminate was a beacon of color in the garden.
meanings.sent5: Children loved to pick the staminate and use them in their pretend play.
